main event: A bright, metallic object was sighted in the sky in Silver Spring, Maryland on September 2, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a large star with a bright glow around the edges.,The object was silent during the observation.,The observation lasted for about 10-15 seconds.,The witness had previously seen UFOs and had more experience with such sightings.,One incident involved a silver saucer-shaped object reported by five employees of a glass company, which hovered and then accelerated rapidly.
witness description: employees of a local glass company
